get.summary: Returns a paginated list of the most recent events in the selected organization. Note that if you have a permission below admin, you can only query your own events.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The Id of the organization. A list of all your organizations can be retrieved using the GET /v1/members/me route. A valid id can look like this: YiwUPDF2zFWaRG01

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: How many items to skip before start taking ones to return

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: The amount of items to get after the specified offset. Can be more than there are items available, but not more than this route's limit of items per page.

parameters.name: Behavior
parameters.description: How the query should execute

500.description: When an unexpected internal server error occurs

400.description: Will return a BadRequest if a property has an invalid value

get.summary:
Gets the current session.
Use this route with a interval of 5 seconds to get the current status.
Status property - OFFLINE / READY / CONNECTED
OFFLINE - start the session
READY - comes with QR Code. If it's empty, it was read successifuly and is connecting. If has QR Code, is ready to be read.
CONNECTED - comes with Phone, Picture, Pushname (from the phone connected) 
    and IsDifferentPhoneConnected that's true if the phone connected is differente from the channel and the session is stoped 
    and the process restart.

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The Id of the organization. A list of all your organizations can be retrieved using the GET /v1/members/me route. A valid id can look like this: YiwUPDF2zFWaRG01

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Channel id

parameters.name: keepOffline
parameters.description: Optional parameters in case you don't want to start the session if it's offline

404.description: An object with the sent identifier could not be found

500.description: When an unexpected internal server error occurs

400.description: Will return a BadRequest if a property has an invalid value

get.summary:

get.summary:
Gets the QR Code to be read.
The QR Code is generated time to time for security reasons.
Use this route with a interval of 2 seconds to get the current QR Code.
If the QR Code was read successfuly, the return property will be empty.

put.summary:
Allows to update the activation status (active, disabled) of a user in an organization.
If you're an Admin in the selected organization, you can enable or disable any user in that organization.
If your permission is below Admin, you're only allowed to disable yourself.
When deactivating someone, it is possible to choose whether or not to close all conversations with this attendant.

delete.summary:
Attempts to delete a message. Depending on the type of channel and the desired "deleteForEveryone" behavior, these things might happen:
1. The message needs to be deleted only in out database and is deleted immediately within this action. (Business channel, delete for me).
2. The message cannot be deleted because the remote locations where the message should also be deleted no longer accept to be deleted because of time restraints (Starter channel, delete for everyone).
3. The remote location where the message should also be deleted does not allow messages to deleted at all (Business channel, delete for everyone).
4. The message can be deleted in the remote location, but the only thing the action does is request it. Deletion from our database only happens when we receive a confirmation that the message was actually deleted (Starter channel, delete for me or everyone).

parameters.name: organizationId

parameters.description: The message to delete

parameters.name: deleteForEveryone
parameters.description: Attempts to delete for everyone in the chat if true. Attempts to delete just for ourselves when false.

post.summary: Post a message to a chat

TempId.description: An Id generated by the client that is passed along when the message is comitted to the database and has the true id. Not necessary for fire-and-forget situations

Prefix.description: A prefix to be concatenated with the message. Used by the app to include the operator name. Not required

ChatId.description: The Id of the chat to send the message to. Must exist and be open

IsPrivate.description: Private messages are not sent to the contact, they function like an internal annotation

PreviousMessageId.description: Used by the app to ensure messages are sent in order. Not necessary

StickUrl.description: If the message you're sendind is a sticker, here you put its URL

ReplyToMessageId.description: When the message you're sending is a reply to another message, use the other message's Id here

SkipReassign.description: When true, will skip the step of reassigning the conversation to the user who sent the message

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description:
The only considered values of this property are Day, Month and Year.
The day is set for the first day of the month.
The hour is set for the first hour of the day.

parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description:
The only considered values of this property are Day, Month and Year.
The day is set for the next day in order to find conversation opened during the day searched.
The hour is set for the last hour of the day.

parameters.name: SearchType
parameters.description: Determine the type of conversations desired.

parameters.description: The Id of the organization. A list of all your organizations can be retrieved using the GET /v1/members/me route. A valid id can look like this: YiwUPDF2zFWaRG01

500.description: When an unexpected internal server error occurs

400.description: Will return a BadRequest if a property has an invalid value

get.summary: Gets a paginated list of notifications for the current user

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The Id of the organization. A list of all your organizations can be retrieved using the GET /v1/members/me route. A valid id can look like this: YiwUPDF2zFWaRG01

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: How many items to skip before start taking ones to return

parameters.name: Take
parameters.description: The amount of items to get after the specified offset. Can be more than there are items available, but not more than this route's limit of items per page.

parameters.name: Behavior
parameters.description: How the query should execute

500.description: When an unexpected internal server error occurs

get.summary: Gets a list of webhooks registered in the desired organization

parameters.name: organizationId
parameters.description: The Id of the organization. A list of all your organizations can be retrieved using the GET /v1/members/me route. A valid id can look like this: YiwUPDF2zFWaRG01

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Optionally you can pass a channel Id to retrieve only webhooks registered in it

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Optionally, you can pass a query string to filter webhooks' names

404.description: An object with the sent identifier could not be found

500.description: When an unexpected internal server error occurs

400.description: Will return a BadRequest if a property has an invalid value

organizationMember.description: The current member that has the chat

organizationMembers.description: All the members who participated in this chat

lastMessage.description: Last message sent or received. Shortcut for displaying

BasicChatModel.description: Model containing only the basic info to display a chat

channels.description: A list of all the channels this bot will act upon

title.description: The title of this bot, for internal reference only

order.description: The order this bot should be put alongside others when executing

final.description: When true, will prevent the execution of further bots on the channel if this bot decides it should execute

ChannelReferencePlatform.description: We created that enum to prevent clients to know the backend technologies we work

channelPlatform.description: We created that enum to prevent clients to know the backend technologies we work

channelIds.description: A list of all the channels this bot will act upon

title.description: The title of this bot, for internal reference only

order.description: The order this bot should be put alongside others when executing

final.description: When true, will prevent the execution of further bots on the channel if this bot decides it should execute

phoneNumber.description: A phone number in the E.164 standard

landline.description: A phone number in the E.164 standard

tempId.description: An Id generated by the client that is passed along when the message is comitted to the database and has the true id. Not necessary for fire-and-forget situations

prefix.description: A prefix to be concatenated with the message. Used by the app to include the operator name. Not required

chatId.description: The Id of the chat to send the message to. Must exist and be open

isPrivate.description: Private messages are not sent to the contact, they function like an internal annotation

previousMessageId.description: Used by the app to ensure messages are sent in order. Not necessary

stickUrl.description: If the message you're sendind is a sticker, here you put its URL

replyToMessageId.description: When the message you're sending is a reply to another message, use the other message's Id here

skipReassign.description: When true, will skip the step of reassigning the conversation to the user who sent the message

toPhone.description: A phone number in the E.164 standard

fromPhone.description: A phone number in the E.164 standard

skipReassign.description: When true, will skip the step of reassigning the conversation to the user who sent the message
When true, will skip the step of reassigning the conversation to the user who sent the message

bulkSession.description: Used to group messages by a bulk send session

toPhone.description: A phone number in the E.164 standard

fromPhone.description: A phone number in the E.164 standard

skipReassign.description: When true, will skip the step of reassigning the conversation to the user who sent the message

bulkSession.description: Used to group messages by a bulk send session

header.description: Template's header. Only applicable when template type is text.

displayName.description: The display name to show within uTalk and as the username for the WhatsApp account. Must follow these rules: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/display-name

currentBSPId.description: The Id of the current BSP the number is with. Required if Umbler.UTalk.Core.Models.Channel.CreateWabaChannelModel.WabaStatus is Umbler.UTalk.Core.Domain.PhoneNumberWabaStatus.MigrateWaba

businessManagerId.description: The Id of the Facebook business account the number is already in or will be created at.

channelIds.description: A list of all the channels this bot will act upon

title.description: The title of this bot, for internal reference only

order.description: The order this bot should be put alongside others when executing

final.description: When true, will prevent the execution of further bots on the channel if this bot decides it should execute

chatId.description: The chat to forward the message to

skipReassign.description: When true, will skip the step of reassigning the conversation to the user who sent the message

code.description: Code of the error when fail to deliver the message

reason.description: Reason of the error when fail to deliver the message

url.description: A URL to the uploaded file

contentType.description: The original content-type of the file

originalName.description: The original name of the file

originalSizeBytes.description: The original size of the file, expressed in bytes

data.description: Binary data of the file, when applicable

prefix.description: The message's prefix. Usually the name of the person who sent the message, which is included in the final message sent. But stored separately because of not being relevant for search

headerContent.description: Header of the message. Exclusive for templates.

content.description: The written content of the message.

footer.description: Footer of the message. Exclusive for templates.

file.description: If the message includes a file, this will have its details

thumbnail.description: In supported channels, a file message may include a thumbnail of the file before loading the full file

contacts.description: If the message type is a contact card, this will include them

messageType.description: The type of the message sent originally

sentByOrganizationMember.description: Basic data of the CompanyMember that sent this message, null if sent by the contact.

isPrivate.description: Private messages should not be sent to the contact. It's visible only to CompanyMembers

location.description: If the message is of type location, this will include the coordinates

question.description: If the message was sent by a bot who asked a question, this will include the presented options

inReplyTo.description: If the message is a reply of another message, this will include the other message's id

messageState.description: The most current state of this message

eventAtUTC.description: The time the message was sent or received. Instead of the time it was saved in our database

chat.description: The details of the associated chat

fromContact.description: If the message was sent by a member, this will include their information

templateId.description: If the message is a template, this will include its id

buttons.description: If the message includes buttons the contact can press, this will include them

botInstance.description: If the message was sent by a bot, this will include its instance id

forwardedFrom.description: If the message was forwarded, this will include the Id of the original message

scheduledMessage.description: If the message was scheduled, this will include the schedule Id

bulkSendSession.description: Used to group messages by a bulk send session

MessageTypes.description: All the possibilities of a message

id.description: The Id of the object generated automatically

createdAtUTC.description: The exact time the entity was created in UTC

NotificationModel.description: Model containing only the basic info to display a chat

totalItems.description: The total amount of items that can be queried.

skipped.description: How many items were skipped. How many there are before the first item in the list

took.description: The amount of items taken after the specified offset. This number equals the number of items in the list

maxTake.description: The maximum amount of items this route can return in a single request

items.description: The items in the selected slice. Will be empty if the operation is count-only

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer 12345abcdef"
Bearer.name: Authorization
